title: Spring constant of spring with box on incline

content.prompt: The object subsequently oscillates about an equilibrium position at a displacement x0 from the unstretched position of the spring. What is the spring constant of the spring?

choices.label: m g x 0 cos θ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F45@

m g x 0 sin θ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F4A@

m g tan θ x 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F29@

m g cos θ x 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F2B@

m g sin θ x 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F30@

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
